column3: The patch makes absolutely sense and why not create a patch for your second suggestions, too :)?\n
Can you squash the 2 commits into one please.\n
@Diapolo Aaaah... I hate github... I hate git... I was trying to rebase everything in local and I closed the pull... \n

`git fetch upstream`
`git rebase upstream`
`git rebase origin -i`
use `squash` before your 2nd commit
`git push origin patch-20 -f`
